segment.source: How to Perform General Administrative Tasks in the App-V Client Management Console
segment.target: How to Perform General Administrative Tasks in the App-V Client Management Console

segment.source: The App-V Client Management Console enables users who are local administrators to manage their applications.
segment.target: The App-V Client Management Console enables users who are local administrators to manage their applications.

segment.source: How to Set Up Publishing Servers
segment.target: How to Set Up Publishing Servers

segment.source: Provides procedures for setting up App-V Servers and for adding more App-V Servers to both the App-V Desktop Client and the App-V Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).
segment.target: Provides procedures for setting up App-V Servers and for adding more App-V Servers to both the App-V Desktop Client and the App-V Client for Remote Desktop Services (formerly Terminal Services).

segment.source: How to Refresh the Publishing Servers
segment.target: How to Refresh the Publishing Servers

segment.source: Provides a procedure for refreshing the App-V Servers from the App-V Client Management Console.
segment.target: Provides a procedure for refreshing the App-V Servers from the App-V Client Management Console.

segment.source: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings
segment.target: How to Disable or Modify Disconnected Operation Mode Settings

segment.source: Provides procedures for disabling or modifying disconnected operation mode settings.
segment.target: Provides procedures for disabling or modifying disconnected operation mode settings.

segment.source: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client
segment.target: User Access Permissions in Application Virtualization Client

segment.source: Provides the list of user access permissions.
segment.target: Provides the list of user access permissions.

segment.source: Describes the disconnected operation mode and circumstances that affect it.
